Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to food product price gouging
Summary: Provides that no party within the chain of distribution of food and food products shall sell or offer to sell any such goods for an amount which represents an unconscionably excessive price; provides a legal remedy; authorizes the attorney general to promulgate such rules and regulations.
LawCode: Add ยง369-aa, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to food product price gouging
